title: Lynda - Video for Photographers 01: Filmmaking Essentials
description:
Lynda - Video for Photographers 01: Filmmaking Essentials

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been posed, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

37m 53s Appropriate for all Jun 26, 2015   | Uploaded in Jan 10, 2015 by 2boweb

Subjects: Photography Video 
Author: Eduardo Angel 

With most current digital cameras and a little training, photographers can start shooting video, quickly expanding their creative options and the range of services they can offer to their clients.â€¨â€¨In this course, Emmy-winning filmmaker Eduardo Angel helps bridge the gap between photography and filmâ€”between still pictures and moving imagesâ€”by showing what it takes to transition to video. The course covers the most essential video production techniques, from framing and lighting for continuous shots to directing the viewer's attention and incorporating camera movement and soundâ€”Eduardo even provides a brief overview of his post-production workflow. By following along with Eduardo and his team, you'll understand why these concepts are so important and start applying them to your video and hybrid projects right away.â€¨â€¨Look for the follow-up course, Video for Photographers 02: Filmmaking On Location, where Eduardo shows how these lessons apply to a real-world shoot. Coming soon to the lynda.com library!
Topics include:
	â€¢	Understanding the 5 Cs of cinematography
	â€¢	Choosing the right camera
	â€¢	Framing for continuous shots
	â€¢	Lighting techniques
	â€¢	Using camera movement to enhance your story
	â€¢	Leading the senses with sound
	â€¢	Working with different microphones
	â€¢	Editing and post-production considerations
